short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects high CPU usage and helps user to take action on misbehaving tabs. Extension works only on Canary, Dev and Chromium !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sometimes web users come across poorly designed websites, web frames, ads or simply malware that ends up consuming inadequately high amounts of computer resources and degrading workflow and user experience. CPU Guard extension is made to mitigate the issue and help users to quickly pinpoint problematic websites and take action.
